message: Hi Bob! I have a great product I think you'll be really interested in. I'm offering it to you for $150.

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I appreciate it, but I've found the same product available from another seller for $120. I'd be interested in purchasing from you instead if you can offer a better price. Would you consider selling it for $100?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
